metadata.title: Tuesday, 10th November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the pontoon at Kapalala in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency will become fully operational; and
(b)    when pontoon staff houses will be constructed.
(a)    what the staffing levels at the following primary schools in Sikongo Parliamentary Constituency were, as of August, 2015:
(b)    of the schools above, how many were under-staffed; and

(c)    when more teachers will be deployed to the understaffed schools. QUESTIONS FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W7    Mr Muteteka (Chisamba) - to ask the Vice-President what developmental projects the Government implemented in Chisamba Parliamentary Constituency from October, 2011 to September, 2015, year by year. W8    Mr Milambo (Mwembeshi) - to ask the Minister of Agriculture:
(a)    how many metric tonnes of maize were purchased by the Food Reserve Agency as of 15th September, 2015, province by province;
(b)    how many tonnes were purchased from Shibuyunji District; and

(c)    how many tonnes had been moved to safe storage facilities as of the same date. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply: Resumption of Debate: (Head 20/04: under consideration): (Ms Kalima).
